strings.ARTIFACT_MIX_INTERACTABLE_DESC: Interactables can appear outside their usual environments.
strings.LUNAR_TELEPORTER_ALIGN_DREAM: <style=cWorldEvent>The Primordial Teleporter aligns with your new dream..</style>
strings.LUNAR_TELEPORTER_ALIGN_NOTDREAM: <style=cWorldEvent>The Primordial Teleporter no longer aligns with your dream..</style>
strings.ARTIFACT_RANDOM_STAGEORDER_DESC: Stages progress in a random order. Portals may appear outside their usual environments.
strings.ARTIFACT_SINGLE_INTERACTABLE_DESC: Stages only spawn one type of chest, shrine, drone and printer per stage
strings.ARTIFACT_SINGLE_INTERACTABLE_DESC_OLD: Each Interactable category will only contain one entry per stage.
strings.ARTIFACT_THREE_MONSTERS_DESC: Stages only spawn one type of small, medium and large monster per stage.
strings.ARTIFACT_SINGLE_ELITE_DESC: All elites will be the same type per stage.
strings.ITWAVE_ARTIFACT_SINGLE_ELITE_DESC: All elites will be of the same type.
strings.ARTIFACT_SINGLE_ITEM_DESC:
All item tiers only contain one item per stage.
Printers are unaffected.
strings.ARTIFACT_REROLL_ITEMS_DESC: Reroll all items and equipments each stage.
strings.ARTIFACT_REROLL_DRONES_DESC: Reroll all drones betwee each stage. Start with 1 common drone.
strings.ARTIFACT_REROLL_SKILLS_DESC: Randomized your skill loadout every stage.
strings.ITWAVE_ARTIFACT_REROLL_SKILLS_DESC: Use a random loadout for this wave.
strings.ARTIFACT_SPEED_ONLOWHEALTH_DESC: All characters move and attack faster the lower their health gets.
strings.ITWAVE_ARTIFACT_SPEED_ONLOWHEALTH_DESC: Characters move and attack faster at lower health.
strings.ARTIFACT_DOUBLEPLAYER_DESC:
Players are doubled, but have half health.
Stop your double by holding <style=cStack>[Interact]</style>
strings.ARTIFACT_RANDOMLYANYTIER_DESC: Items have a chance to be replaced with one of a random tier.
